functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Ashen Fish\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"A charm distributed to the undead","color":"gray"}','{"text":"of the Depths in the name of","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Saviour Moses. It appears little more","color":"gray"}','{"text":"than a raw fish stuffed full of ash,","color":"gray"}','{"text":"but it bears much more significance","color":"gray"}','{"text":"than that.","color":"gray"}']}}
